name: Lone Dwarf
description:
WASD Movement, Space to jump.

I recorded the making of this game and will be uploading a devlog soon! Follow me if you're interested in seeing how this game was made in 3 days!

I couldn't get highlights to work, so some puzzles might be a bit harder than intended.

Quick adventure game made in 3 days for the Weekly Game Jam 276. Fits the theme "Glass Shards" very loosly. Only starting on the 2nd level...

Disclaimer: Visual and Audio assets purchased from the Unity Asset Store are being used all over the place in this one!

Glhf! Hope you enjoy it!
